about_the_game:
Team up with four friends and dive into mysterious mines in search of hidden treasure. But be careful - the deeper you go, the more evil awakens to stop you. Encounter strangers between descents, help them and earn valuable rewards. Find treasure, complete quests, and fight your way through the darkness as you struggle to reach the surface before it’s too late. But remember... the shadows are watching you.

Immersive Horror Experience

You head to explore within the maze-like, procedurally generated tunnels. Each descent offers a fresh, spine-chilling adventure with new layouts, obstacles, and secrets to uncover. The deeper you go, the greater the dangers you face, from puzzles to terrifying creatures.

Cooperative Multiplayer

Team up with up to 4 players in this intense, cooperative experience. Communication and teamwork are vital as you work together to complete your tasks, survive, and decide whether to finish the mission or reset the game and try again.

Terrifying Creatures and Challenges

Face off against terrifying creatures, each with unique behaviors, forcing you to adapt and find new survival strategies. From puzzles blocking your path to creatures hunting you in the dark, every descent offers unpredictable dangers.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features intense horror themes and realistic depictions of violence. Player characters can be attacked and killed by creatures, which may involve sudden scares and graphic scenes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A team of scientists explores deep mines where people mysteriously vanished. Conduct observations, collect artifacts, don't disturb the evil—and escape alive in this 4-player co-op horror.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
